rooms.name: entrance_hall
rooms.description: A spacious entrance hall with Art Deco finishes and Vastu-aligned east facing entry. The area features a reception desk, decorative mouldings, and polished flooring.

rooms.name: living_room
rooms.description: An open-plan living room adjoining the central courtyard, featuring modern Art Deco elements and comfortable seating areas. Large windows provide natural light and a view of the outdoor space.

rooms.name: kitchen
rooms.description: A fully equipped kitchen with high-end appliances, integrated cabinetry in Art Deco style, and Vastu-compliant north-east positioning to encourage prosperity and health.

rooms.name: dining_area
rooms.description: An adjacent dining area, designed for both intimate meals and entertaining guests, featuring a classic Art Deco table and light fixtures that complement the overall design aesthetic.

rooms.name: central_courtyard
rooms.description: A landscaped courtyard central to the house plan, providing natural ventilation and ambient lighting, with water features and greenery that adhere to Vastu guidelines.

rooms.name: master_bedroom
rooms.description: The master bedroom features a private balcony overlooking the central courtyard and incorporates Art Deco design elements with Vastu alignment to enhance relaxation and tranquility.

rooms.name: bedroom_2
rooms.description: A secondary bedroom designed with light-colored finishes, functional storage solutions, and window placements as per Vastu guidelines for restful sleep.

rooms.name: bathroom
rooms.description: An ensuite bathroom adjoining the master bedroom, equipped with modern fixtures in a retro Art Deco style that balances aesthetics and practicality.

rooms.name: library
rooms.description: A dedicated library space designed to foster learning and creativity. It includes built-in bookshelves, comfortable seating, and natural lighting through Vastu-aligned windows.

rooms.name: rooftop_terrace
rooms.description: A rooftop terrace offering panoramic views, designed with Art Deco accents and comfortable outdoor seating areas. The terrace is accessible via a staircase that complies with safety norms.

openings.name: library_window
features: maximizes natural light while maintaining privacy
